body: he New York City Department of Health last week released a list of 40 food establishments cited for violating the health code. In addition, it listed five that were allowed to reopen after correcting earlier violations. The establishments are these: Violations MANHATTAN Cafeteria Ideal, 991 Amsterdam Ave. (109th St.). El Chevere Restaurant, 454 9th
title: NEW YORK INSPECTORS CITE 40 FOOD OUTLETS FOR HEALTH OFFENSEST

body: FIRST, there was the cataclysm. Never mind what kind of cataclysm; maybe it was a sudden shifting of those great plates on which the surface of the world sits, precariously. No matter, this is only a scenario of what flits through a wildly undisciplined mind. The script writer can sketch in the details. After all, an island that has hurricanes can
title: ABOUT LONG ISLAND; THE ISLAND CAST ADRIFT

body: SEARINGTOWN I WAS very grateful when they closed the Herricks schools after it snowed the other day. My boys, you see, do not wear galoshes (a name that strikes them as so hysterically funny that they point to me and turn red when I mention it; I get a similar reaction when I say ''dungarees'' instead of ''jeans''). There seems to be some Long
title: ABOUT LONG ISLAND
